objects.specification: A large square floor panel finished in a neutral light wood tone with subtle grain detail, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere across the entire booth space.
A straight back wall standing three meters high, finished in a smooth neutral light gray plaster to define the rear boundary of the booth while maintaining a clean, professional look.
A left side wall three meters tall, coated in a smooth neutral light gray finish to enclose the booth area and provide a backdrop for displays.
A right side wall three meters in height, rendered in a neutral light gray plaster finish, contributing to a cohesive booth enclosure.

A modern rectangular registration desk sized for one person, featuring a bright red finish in RGB for high visibility at the booth entrance, with a clean minimalist countertop ideal for attendee check-in.
A vertical display shelf with a high-quality natural wood grain texture and finish, featuring multiple open tiers designed for elegantly showcasing products.
A vertical display shelf with a high-quality natural wood grain texture and finish, featuring multiple open tiers designed for elegantly showcasing products.

A small round table with a contemporary minimalist design, featuring a smooth light wood tabletop and slender supports for a clean and modern profile.
A small round table with a contemporary minimalist design, featuring a smooth light wood tabletop and slender supports for a clean and modern profile.
A modern chair with a blue upholstered seat and back, featuring slim metal legs in a matching finish and a comfortable ergonomic profile oriented toward the table.

A vertical promotional banner in a bright yellow hue, crafted from smooth fabric to hang freely from the ceiling without touching any furniture.

A compact spotlight fixture with a matte housing, emitting warm white light in RGB, mounted along the top edges of the booth walls and angled to highlight display areas.

A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and a simple planter pot, adding a natural accent and visual interest in the booth corner.

A tall narrow bookshelf with a slender wood grain frame and multiple shelves, optimized for organizing and displaying promotional materials in a refined manner.
